author: ekoneil
msg: Fix for SVN 569 in ControlFilter.  Changed the reference to ServletControlContext to ServletBeanContext.

author: quinlan
msg: move "burn stage" to be much later in process, once people can be downloading
the tarball (and we know from experience that people will download them
immediately, even before they are listed on a web page or announced)

Also fix a Javadoc bug with a runon word.  For that matter, is it "runon" or "run on"?
